about: This is a bot. For claiming waifus/husbandos. And it is in development. It's probably going to disappear soon. Not much more about it than that. The guy who develops it is named ExtraConcentratedJuice. He's pretty cool. The bot is written in C# using the discord.net library. I don't use their commands framework though, since I don't like it. I've made a number of other things but you probably wouldn't care about them. If you want to GIVE ME SOME CASHMONEY for my work or whatever, you can do so at this bitcoin address: 1EtPp79x2xPXSzWagKMvgFqhk4jghhXEip
